room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: Super fun! Very kind and helpful employee! Only had 8 seconds to spare but escaped. There were four of us. We laughed a lot and were confused occasionally but managed to escape. Definitely will go back again.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: Had an amazing time playing Mystery Mansion with Max as our game master! We surprised a friend for her birthday and I don't want to spoil any secrets, so I'll just say they really made it an extra special experience for her! We will DEFINITELY be going back!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: Just finished trying the Mystery Mansion game. Didn't finish but it was a lot of fun!  Smaller and more personal attention than the bigger rooms at other places.  Our game master was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: SO SO fun!!! I’ve played Kidnapping and Mystery Mansion, and both were super fun. The game masters are all so nice and helpful! Best escape game I’ve been to!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: Mystery Mansion was an absolute blast! All of the employees here are super friendly and easy to talk to, which definitely helped calm our nerves before playing. There were tons of really good challenges, but our game master gave us the perfect clues and we broke out! I’ll definitely be returning.
